name: Doraemon: Story of Seasons
description:
Doraemon: Story of Seasons is a RPG-simulation game. It was originally released in 2019. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Doraemon: Story of Seasons on PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and PC. You can purchase the game on Steam and Nintendo eShop.
